stx.reactive.Collections

type
class

Static Methods

toStream<T>(collection : Iterable<T>, time : Int) : Stream<T>

parameters
collection The collection.
time The time, in milliseconds.
Converts a collection to a stream, whose events are separated by the specified amount of time.

toStreamS<T>(collection : Iterable<T>, time : Signal<Int>) : Stream<T>

parameters
collection The collection.
time The time, as a signal, in milliseconds.
Converts a collection to a stream, whose events are separated by the specified amount of time.

Constructor

new()
